messages.subject: Re: was -wife swap and suchlike - crazy stuff
messages.msgSnippet: LOL... Now I know why I love  this list... other people that are fun crazy  and don t follow rules... some recent silly stuff we have done include: a bath tub
messages.messageBody:
LOL... Now I know why I love this list... other people that are fun crazy and don't follow rules... some recent silly stuff we have done include:

a bath tub full of jello
a snow ball fight inside the car
a muddy puddle war in WalMarts parking lot
Letting my 4yr old put make up on me while we waited for our meal at a local "upscale" Mexican restaurant ( she also spoke only Spanish the whole time which would not be that weird except she only knows words she learned from Dora the Explorer and she used none of them correctly just strung them all together :)

anyone else want to share some wacky adventures? to show my kids I am not alone in my wackyness!!

Blessings
Andre' (now with bright pink hair)
unschooled among the Amish in Rural Indiana and giving the town something to "talk" about
Broguen 17 - LeCe 15 - Trinity - 11 - Aubra Faye 4



catsellsavon@... wrote:
It probably didn't help diffuse my "crazy" image when I jumped in the
bathtub with Jalen and Sierra last week...fully clothed.

That just sounds fun.. not crazy! LOL

Cathey Jones

Change your thoughts and change your world.
Norman Vincent Peale (1898 - 1993)

messages.subject: homeschoolers on wife swap and suchlike
messages.msgSnippet: I have to say I am glad I was picked as the normal mom.  :)  sometimes you are not sure which one you are. LOL HA! MY kids decided *I* was the crazy Mom and
messages.messageBody:
" I have to say I am glad I was picked as
the normal mom. :) sometimes you are not sure which one you are. LOL"

HA! MY kids decided *I* was the crazy Mom and they wouldn't be able to
handle a "normal" Mom so I am forbidden to ever participate in that
show. :)
It probably didn't help diffuse my "crazy" image when I jumped in the
bathtub with Jalen and Sierra last week...fully clothed.

Ren
learninginfreedom.com

messages.subject: homeschoolers on wife swap and suchlike
messages.msgSnippet: Yeah, that s not too bad, but if I had to go to a job where I had to dress up, wear heels, MAKE-UP...  Yuck.   Weeellll...at least you know who to call
messages.messageBody:
" Yeah, that's not too bad, but if I had to go to a job
where I had to dress up, wear heels, MAKE-UP... Yuck. <g> "

Weeellll...at least you know who to call in a pinch.;)

Ren
learninginfreedom.com
